attributes.action: Change in law for primary school children
attributes.additional_details: Safeguarding children is of the upmost importance and this needs addressing and changed as a few years ago there was a incident at a primary school where two children of the opposite sex was touching each other and some girls bodies develop earlier than others
attributes.background: Children changing in same classroom as opposite sex allowed need a change in law to lower the age from 11 year old down to 6 year olds due to safeguarding our children
